gobblin.source

Interface PartitionAwareFileRetriever

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatePartitionedNestedRetriever, RegexBasedPartitionedRetriever

    public interface PartitionAwareFileRetriever
    Interface for an object that, given a sourcePath and a low watermark, can return a set of files to process that are newer than the low watermark.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      • getFilesToProcess

        List<PartitionAwareFileRetriever.FileInfo> getFilesToProcess(long minWatermark,
                                                             int maxFilesToReturn)
                                                      throws IOException
        Return a list of files to process that have a watermark later than minWatermark. Generally, a FileRetriever should find each valid partition after minWatermark, sorted by ascending time. For each partition: 1. Add all files in the partition 2. If the # of files in the return list is now greater than maxFilesToReturn, return immediately 3. Else continue to next partition until there are none left maxFilesToReturn is a soft cap - all files in a partition should be returned by getFilesToProcess().
        Throws:
        IOException
